items.sentence: Tom would\'ve died if Mary hadn\'t rescued him.
Why don\'t the three of us have lunch together?
Why don\'t we go to the mountains this weekend?
Didn\'t you know Tom isn\'t really from Boston?
Tom still hasn\'t found what he\'s looking for.
I\'ve got a feeling that Tom will show up soon.
I\'ve got to find out when Tom plans to arrive.
I\'ve heard that some people sleep in bathtubs.
Tom didn\'t tell me why he was going to Boston.
Tom didn\'t think Mary would enjoy the concert.
